text: Motion
Motion
Staff
Photographer
Photographer

Sorry,
I... I'm feeling nervous, aren't I...

Eh...!
Really...? I don't think so at all!
You look fresh, and it's very Haruki-like.

I still get nervous when I'm
in front of the camera...
Do you have any tips or tricks...?

Well, let's see... Since the readers of the magazine
are older than you, Haruki-chan...

Yeah, how about trying to act like
you're talking to the Producer?
Huh...?
Producer-san...?

P-Pro... Producer...!
Good work...!

Y-Yeah...!
Good job...!

...Hehe, you two seem a bit awkward...!
You were getting along so well earlier.

Huh? Getting along...?
I mean, I don't know about that...!

Come on, don't deny it like that,
Producer-san will get hurt.
Hahaha...

Ah, sorry, Producer-san...
It's not what you think...!
I'll do it properly...!

Producer-san,
what's the plan for after this?

Oh, uh, nothing specific.
I was thinking of heading back once we're done.

I see...!
Well, I have something I'd like to discuss...
Phew...
Good job, Haruki.

Hehe... Good job...!
We did this earlier too, in front of the camera...

Haha...
Indeed.

──By the way, during the shoot, you mentioned
having a "question" or something... Can I ask now?

Hehe... I'm glad you remembered.
It's more like reflection than a question...

Today didn't go so well,
I think...

Huh?
That's not true.

You were the one who actively
asked questions like that, right?

I thought it was amazing how you tried
to figure things out on your own.
Huh...?
And in the end, the atmosphere changed, and I think we got some good shots.

Is... Is that so...?
That's a relief...

Sometimes, asking for help or advice
from others is a good thing, I think.

Haruki, you seem to naturally
be able to do that.
Naturally...?
Uh, maybe because I'm the youngest among my siblings?

Haha...
I don't think that's the only reason?
